title: Development of Instructional Design Strategies for AI-Based Moral Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational tool usage experience and understanding of moral education concepts
context.additional_context: Enhances instructional design capabilities applicable to real educational settings by combining AI tool proficiency with moral education approaches

learning_goals: Learners can design educational content conveying moral values (honesty, cooperation, perseverance) using AI-based animation production tools
Learners can critically evaluate the educational applicability and limitations of AI tools through case analysis and thematic discussions
Learners can develop AI-based assessment strategies that measure learner engagement and language proficiency improvements

resources: AI animation production platform (e.g., Vyond, D-ID)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
